add support for a logger function in errprinter (#681)* add support for a logger function in errprinter* this enables other software to monkey patch the logger function to capture dronekit output and exceptions* moved print to stderr to logger function* monkey patching logger will replace the print to stderr functionality instead of supplement it

mavlink.py: efficient I/O waiting with select()pymavlink uses non-blocking sockets and serial ports: polling fordata in a while loop with a sleep(0.05) is inefficient and leads toincreased latency for incoming MAVLink messages (issue #863).
